Name: Blood Ties
About the game: Description Join Chloe and her friends in a journey to stop the evil vampires! Chloe finds out there is another race living among the mortals, what will she do now? Play and find it out! Adventure yourself in a journey full of action and joy! More games by Warfare Studios
